name: One-time note
short_description:
One-time note (the name is a play on one-time pad) is a PHP-script, which can be hosted on your own webserver to create notes or messages. These information can 
only be accessed one time.

If you don't trust your communication-channel, this might be a solution for you. It prevents storing private information on untrustworthy servers (mailserver, 
social-networks, ...).

This could be an alternative, if your communication partners don't understand, how to encrypt messages safely.

This idea is inspired by PrivNote, a service, which does the same, but doesn't let you run your own service.
summary: A PHP-script to create disposable notes, which can be used only once.
